amendment.description: To require a report on the aircraft of the Army to perform the High-altitude Aviation Training Site of the Army National Guard.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1382 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1382 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To require a report on the aircraft of the Army to perform the High-altitude Aviation Training Site of the Army National Guard.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1382 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1382 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
